isomiRs
  • Get Started
  • Reference

    isomiRs

    Analyze isomiRs from seqbuster tool or any BAM file after using seqcluster seqbuster

    Installation

    This is an R package.

    Bioconductor stable version

    source("https://bioconductor.org/biocLite.R")
biocLite("isomiRs")

    Bioconductor latest version

    devtools::install_git("https://git@git.bioconductor.org/packages/isomiRs")

    devtools development version

    install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("lpantano/isomiRs")

    Links

    • Download from BIOC at
